# 2022 CONCACAF Awards

| runtime          =
| previous         = 2021
| main             = CONCACAF Awards
| next             = 2023–24
}}
The shortlists for the 2022 CONCACAF Awards were announced on 17 March 2023.
The winners were announced on 5 May 2023.
